Massa Mars ($M$) $= 6,42 \times 10^{23}$ kg

Periode orbit satelit ``Mars-stasioner'' = periode rotasi Mars ($T$) = $24^j 37^m 22^{d},6$

Menggunakan hukum Kepler III

$$\begin{eqnarray*}\frac{a^3}{T^2} &=& \frac{GM}{4 \pi^{2}} \\a &=& \sqrt[3]{\frac{GMT^2}{4 \pi^{2}}} \\a &=& \sqrt[3]{\frac{6,67 \times 10^{-11} \cdot 6,42 \times 10^{23} \cdot 88642,6^2}{4 \pi^{2}}}\\a &=& 20426566,2 \quad \text{m} \\a &=& 20426,566 \approx 20000 \quad \text{km}\end{eqnarray*}$$
